IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO BE A LEADER IN COMMUNITY PARTNERSHIP BUILDING AND TO INCREASE THE ORGANIZED CAPACITY OF PEOPLE TO CARE FOR ONE ANOTHER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO BE A LEADER IN COMMUNITY PARTNERSHIP BUILDING AND TO INCREASE THE ORGANIZED CAPACITY OF PEOPLE TO CARE FOR ONE ANOTHER.
IRS990.Desc: UNITED WAY OF THE ADIRONDACK REGION, INC. IS A NON-PROFIT HUMAN SERVICES ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHED TO CAMPAIGN COLLECTIVELY FOR FUNDS TO DISTRIBUTE TO PARTICIPATING NON-PROFIT MEMBER AGENCIES AND TO COORDINATE A VARIETY OF PROGRAMS, INITIATIVES AND EVENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INCOME TAXES- THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501 (C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE CODE AND HAS NOT MADE A PROVISION FOR FEDERAL INCOME TAXES IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND ASSOCIATED UNRECOGNIZED BENEFITS THAT MATERIALLY IMPACT THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND RELATED DISCLOSURES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NORTH COUNTRY ASSOC FOR VISUALLY IM
UNITED WAY OF THE ADIRONDACK REGION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UPON FURTHER REVIEW OF INFORMATION, THE AUDITOR AND TAXPAYER DETERMINED THAT THERE WAS 31,169 OF UNCOLLECTIBLE PLEDGES RECORDED ON THE BOOKS. AN ADJUSTMENT HAS BEEN MADE TO DECREASE THE PLEDGE RECEIVABLES AND INCREASE UNCOLLECTIBLE PLEDGES BY THE 31,169.
FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND APPROVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, PRESIDENT, AND TREASURER WHEN SIGNED.
ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT AT THE ANNUAL MEETING.
THE EXECUTIVE AND FINANCE COMMITTEES REVIEW THE SALARY OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ANNUALLY AND PRESENT THEIR RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE FULL BOARD FOR APPROVAL.
DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FORM 990 AND THE ANNUAL AUDIT ARE AVAILABLE ONLINE AT THE NYS OFFICE OF CHARITIES BUREAU WEBSITE.
